original_title: Le Goût Salé de tes Lèvres Sucrées
overview: Games of hide and seek seduces in the summer heat of Cannes, passionate and torrid fusses in the calanques, discover the first romantic porn comedy of Ridley Dovarez.  Theo (Ludwig) received an invitation from Stephane (Doryann Marguet), his childhood friend, secretly in love with him, but he had never dared to confess his feelings. Stephane invited him to spend a few days in Cannes to meet again. As he joins him, he discovers that the latter is hosting Ricco (Rico Falate), one of his Italian lovers saying a sports coach auto-stop recovered the old one. Starts a game of seduction to three, where Theo and Stephane conceal their feelings to better admit them through Ricco.
title: The Dirty Taste of Your Sugar Lips
